metadata.how_to_trigger: - Load up GustavDev/CTY_Main_A- Talk to |Cashguard| - S_LOW_CountingHouse_Guard_05 400c9176-b9b5-448c-a283-156b15125eec - (-128; 1; -250)

0.speaker: Cashguard Yonni
0.text: First some nutter cult marching on us, now some nutter killer running around. I'd be grabbing my coin and clearing out, too.

1.speaker: Cashguard Yonni
1.text: Think this armour's real gold? Some Guildie offered me coin for it.
